metadata.title: CVE-2022-29340 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: GPAC 2.1-DEV-rev87-g053aae8-master. has a Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in gf_isom_parse_movie_boxes_internal due to improper return value handling of GF_SKIP_BOX, which causes a Denial of Service. This vulnerability was fixed in commit 37592ad.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
